ThingDef.label: Bionic Animal Eye
ThingDef.description: An advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace a natural eye, but also gives supernatural vision abilities. It fits all kinds of animals except Megascarabs.

ThingDef.label: Simple Prosthetic Animal Arm
ThingDef.description: A simple but durable arm prosthesis. It fits monkeys.

ThingDef.label: Bionic Animal Arm
ThingDef.description: A Bionic Animal Arm is one of the most sophisticated arm replacements. It gives extreme strength to its user. It fits Monkeys.

ThingDef.label: Simple Prosthetic Animal Leg (Small)
ThingDef.description: A simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. It is not very comfortable but it is quite efficient. It fits Boomrats, Chickens, Chinchillas, Domestic Cats, Furxes, Hares, Hedgehogs, Iguanas, Megascarabs, Monkeys, Squirrels, Tortoises, and Yorkshire Terriers.

ThingDef.label: Simple Prosthetic Animal Leg (Medium)
ThingDef.description: A simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. It is not very comfortable but it is quite efficient. It fits Alpacas, Alphabeavers, Border Collies, Capybaras, Huskies, Labrador Retrievers, Lacosdiles, Lions, Quadhogs, Rimdogs, Rimrams, Rimwolfs, Samoyeds, Wargs and Wild Boars.

ThingDef.label: Simple Prosthetic Animal Leg (Large)
ThingDef.description: A simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. It is not very comfortable but it is quite efficient. It fits Boomalopes, Cows, Deers, Dromedaries, Elks, Feralisks, Pigs, Scorpions, Snorks, Spindlecribs, Tarantula and Terramorphs.

ThingDef.description: A simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. It is not very comfortable but it is quite efficient. It fits Alphamuffalo, Elephants, Muffaloes, Rhinoceroses and Thrumboes.
